description:
How would you like to get media exposure all over the web?

How would you like to get media exposure all over major TV networks?

Have bloggers raving about your product/services?

Hi, my name is Katrina Starzhynskaya. I have created this course for you after been featured on major online land offline networks, including Sheknows.com, Global Dispatch, Examiner, Huffington Post Live, Dr. Oz, and multiple magazine covers.

This course will teach you how to:

  • Create an irresistible pitch
  • Find real producers of major TV networks
  • Approach producers
  • Create powerful press releases

As a bonus I have included my personal pitch I have used to connect with luminaries like Sir Richard Branson, Deepak Chopra, Robert Kiyosaki, just to name a few.

Also, I have included my personal Press Release Example as well as a PR template.

I have never revealed this information before and I am not sure how long I will have it live, so get enrolled today!
title: How to get Featured on Major Networks
